entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Wink: Video Enhancer & Editor
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Monthly Auto-renew VIPï¼š$12.99 â†’ $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $12.99]

Application Description

Wink l Make any low-quality video & photo into HD/Ultra HD/4K with before/after comparisons. l Making video editing easier than ever! l Various creative video transition effects enhance final results! l Fine-tune your selfies with video retouch tools to highlight your day! Video ï¼† Photo Enhance - Video Enhancer: Enhance portraits and selfies to stunning output. - 4K Upscaler: AI-powered 4K upscaling for enhanced video quality. - Stabilize: Smooth out shaky footage for professional-looking videos. - Noise reduction: Reduce video noise and grain for professional-looking results. - AI Color: Give your video a vibrant, fresh look with our easy-to-use color enhancement tool Video Retouch - Manual Face Slimming: Adjust your facial features as you wish - Body Shape: Achieve a supermodel physique! - Stylish Makeup: Providing a range of natural makeup - Face Editor: Remove acne, Face Plump, Skin tone ... and more! - Whiten Teeth: Say goodbye to brown teeth and show off your smile! Video Editing - Professional Editing: Color, Crop, Speed, Split, Mirror, Soundtrack and more! - Templates: Easily apply to create high-quality vlogs - Quality Restoration: Clear AI-enhanced video restoration! - Effects: Adds texts, stickers, and transitions to enhance your videos - Automatic Subtitle: Utilizes intelligent voice recognition for easy text inputting AI Captions - Accurate AI subtitles for your videos in seconds - Support Bilingual: Create dual-language subtitles for your videos - Support 8 languages Wink VIP - Access exclusive VIP features Wink offers a wide range of exclusive VIP features to enhance retouching experience. We are committed to providing you with an improved service. We look forward to your continuing support. - Subscriptions Wink VIP-Monthly Subscription offers a subscription period of one month. Wink VIP-Annual subscription entails a 12-month period. *The subscription price is determined based on the information provided in the in-app purchase (iAP) application. - Instructions for Payment and Cancellation "Payment" will be credited to your iTunes account once you have confirmed and paid for your subscription. "Renewal" subscriptions for "Monthly/Annual" plans are automatically renewed and will incur charges to your iTunes account following your purchase confirmation. The subscription will be automatically renewed. To cancel it, please disable the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the subscription period ends. Within 24 hours before the subscription cycle expires, Apple will automatically debit your iTunes account, extending your subscription for a new cycle. "To cancel your subscription, kindly navigate to the "Settings" section on your iPhone, click on "Apple ID," proceed to the "Subscription" screen, and choose "Wink" to terminate your subscription. - Agreement Terms of Serviceï¼šhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/service-global.html?lang=en Privacy Policyï¼šhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/policy-global.html?lang=en

entry.title: Max NTFS - NTFS Disk Helper
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Upgrade to Plus Versionï¼š$12.99 â†’ $11.99 [$11.99 ~ $12.99]

Application Description

Max NTFS is a small tool that can open NTFS format disks in read-write mode. We can support the read and write of NTFS format disks very effectively. Start the application, it will automatically detect all the hard disks, and you can start reading and writing to NTFS format disks with one key operation on the main interface, no need to execute cumbersome commands. Remind: After you finish using the NTFS disk, please do not unplug the USB device directly. Please click the eject button in the App to safely eject. Otherwise, the status of the disk may become dirty, and the last written file may not be saved.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: BetterSnapTool
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BetterTouchTool Licenseï¼š$17.99 â†’ $12.99 [$12.99 ~ $17.99]

Application Description

BetterSnapTool allows you to easily manage your window positions and sizes by either dragging them to one of the screen's corners or to the top, left or right side of the screen. This enables you to easily maximize your windows, position them side by side or even resize them to quarters of the screen. If you need even more than those standard snap areas, BetterSnapTool now allows you to create your own, custom snap areas anywhere on your display. These can resize & move windows to any possible position. More features included are: â€¢ support for multiple monitors â€¢ customizable keyboard shortcuts to trigger any snap area â€¢ lots of design customization options â€¢ always accessible pop up menu showing all possible snap sizes / positions â€¢ move or resize the window below the cursor while holding customizable modifier keys. â€¢ select what happens when double-clicking a window's titlebar â€¢ select what happens when right-clicking any of the red/orange/green window buttons of any window BetterSnapTool is very customizable and will change the way you work with your Mac! BetterSnapTool works with almost every application, only some apps with non-standard windows can't be supported.

entry.title: Antivirus One - Virus Cleaner
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Upgrade to Proï¼š$19.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $19.99]

Application Description

Keep your digital wallets and keychains safe with Antivirus One, your personal cyber security expert. Antivirus One offers live antivirus monitoring to protect your Mac from adware, ransomware, spyware and all kinds of malware attacks. Download now and say goodbye to pop-up scams, spyware and viruses! Developed exclusively by the worldâ€™s largest antivirus and spyware active monitoring lab at Trend Micro. Secure your Mac with these powerful Antivirus One protection features: 1.Â Real Time Detection Live malware detector on the go. Protect your Mac against all threats 24/7. 2. Virus Scanner Quick scan, deep scan or customize scan locations to safeguard every part of your disk. 3. Virus Cleaner (In-App Purchase required) Automatically remove viruses completely for the security of your system and privacy. 4. Adware Cleaner Get rid of pop-ups, adware, and browser hijackers so you can browse at peace. 5. Privacy Cleaner Customize your online transparency. Turn invisible without leaving a trace in your browser. 6. Safe Search Flag safety ratings of every Google search result. 7. Web Threat Protection Prevents users from visiting phishing websites. We highly recommend full disk scanning using Antivirus One on a regular basis to keep your Mac safe from security threats. We offer two auto-renewing subscription options: â€” Monthly: as low as $2.99 â€” Yearly: as low as $19.99 Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will auto-renew unless canceled. â€” Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase â€” Subscription may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the userâ€™s Account Setting after purchase. â€” No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. â€” Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. â€” Your account will be charged for renewal for the amount of your current subscription within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. All cost for subscriptions are mentioned above. We value your feedback, it helps us to improve Antivirus One to better serve you! Please send us your comments or suggestions in the App Store or by the feedback page inside Antivirus One. entry.title: VOX: MP3 & FLAC Music Player
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LOOP for VOX Subscriptionï¼š$109.99 â†’ $49.99 [$49.99 ~ $109.99]

Application Description

#1 Hi-Res audio player for Mac & iPhone. Music just sounds better! *NEW* Introducing VOX Premium â€“ Your Ultimate Music Experience. VOX Premium adds a stunning cloud streaming features and unlimited music storage without a decline in quality. Sync, stream and cache your entire music library on Mac and iPhone in a way that suits you best! Listen to your music regardless of the format: â€¢ Play numerous lossy and lossless (FLAC, APE, WAV, DSD, etc.) audio formats; â€¢ Export playlists in various formats (PLS, M3U, XSPF); â€¢ Open different playlist types including M3U, PLS, XSPF, and the popular CUE format used to store CD rips; â€¢ Play audio files stored on NAS devices and other network drives. Manage your music easily:Â  â€¢ Control the player from the main interface, Dock context menu or main menu controls; â€¢ Automatically search for all the missing album artwork from MusicBrainz and Last.fm databases; â€¢ Use keyboard media keys, headphones controls, and Apple Remote to control the playback (requires VOX Preference Pane); â€¢ Easily add music via smart drop zones, open dialog and Finder context menu; â€¢ Use the Equalizer with presets & custom mode, crossfade, fade on play/pause, converting music to 5.1 or 7.1 format; â€¢ Preview album artwork from your Dock icon; â€¢ Gapless playback support; â€¢ Get system or Growl playback notifications. Focus on music, not the source:Â  â€¢ Work with different audio sources including custom Playlists, iTunes Library, online radio and much more; â€¢ Scrobble to Last.fm to keep your listening stats up-to-date; â€¢ Play any song, any playlist you find on YouTube via VOX FLAC Player, put all your YouTube songs into one media collection. Full SoundCloud integration: â€¢ Easily control SoundCloud via VOX; â€¢ Access the largest music database in the world and discover new tunes; â€¢ Bring your SoundCloud stream and likes directly into VOX. YouTube source: â€¢ Press CMD+U and paste any link from YouTube to play it in VOX. You can add it to VOX collections as well. Last.fm: â€¢ Scrobbling for your music stream; Radio access for VOX Premium subscribers (**NEW**): â€¢ 30'000+ Radio stations categorized by genres and countries!Â  Equip yourself with all of the audiophile tools of VOX Premium: â€¢ Advanced Audio Features: HOG Mode; Improved multi-output device support; â€¢ Convert stereophonic audio in your headphones to binaural using Bauer DSP (BS2B) technology; â€¢ Automatically Pause playback on headphones disconnection; â€¢ Take full advantage of AirPlay (10.8+) to listen with any of your wireless output devices. â€¢ VOX also supports SONOS wireless speakers systems. The beauty of VOX Player is in its simplicity, yet behind the minimal exterior lies a powerful Music Player with a ton of features and support for all audio formats you may ever need.Â  â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“ VOX Premium is available by auto-renewable subscriptions: - $4.99 per month; - $49.99 per year. Your credit card will be charged through your iTunes Account after the purchase confirmation. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.Â  Your subscriptions can be managed in your iTunes Account Settings after purchase is made. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription. VOX Premium privacy policy:Â https://vox.rocks/privacy VOX Premium terms and conditions:Â https://vox.rocks/terms P.S.: FLAC Player, ALAC Player, Lossless Player, SoundCloud Stream Solution, YouTube MP3 Music, Hi-Res audio Player - check all of them in one VOX Music Player.

entry.title: RadarScope
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pro Tier 2ï¼š$99.99 â†’ $14.99 [$14.99 ~ $99.99]

Application Description

RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities. Whether youâ€™re scanning for a mesocycloneâ€™s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricaneâ€™s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radarâ€™s scanning strategy. Your initial app purchase includes the following: â€¢ Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany â€¢ 6-frame radar loops â€¢ Two built-in providers for radar data â€¢ Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US â€¢ Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia â€¢ NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes â€¢ Inspector and distance tools â€¢ Color palette options for radar data â€¢ AllisonHouse data plan integration â€¢ Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting â€¢ mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL â€¢ Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use â€¢ Support for widgets and complications â€¢ Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather: â€¢ 30-frame radar loops â€¢ Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes â€¢ Severe weather watches in the US and Canada â€¢ Special weather statements in the US and Canada â€¢ Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions â€¢ SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks â€¢ WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US â€¢ Local storm reports in the US â€¢ Custom color palette support â€¢ Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices) â€¢ Family Sharing support RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including: â€¢ Everything in Pro Tier One â€¢ 50-frame radar loops â€¢ A third provider for US radar data â€¢ NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive â€¢ Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive â€¢ Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive â€¢ GOES East and GOES West satellite products â€¢ NSSLâ€™s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products â€¢ NCEPâ€™s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products â€¢ Surface observations â€¢ Atmospheric soundings in the US â€¢ Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive â€¢ More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps â€¢ Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA â€¢ Server-sent events for radar and warning updates â€¢ Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices â€¢ Family sharing support If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/ Please visit our web site for more information.

entry.title: Vythm VJ - Music Visualizer DJ
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All features and modesï¼š$44.99 â†’ $29.99 [$29.99 ~ $44.99]

Application Description

--- Experience Your Music with Vythm --- Unlock the potential of music visualization with Vythm! Vythm is a versatile music visualization app that allows you to create visual artworks in harmony with your selected music. It includes a variety of unique visualization modes, including Equalizer, Mandala, Shapes, Fluids, Psychedelic, Dreaming, and more. Choose a background and apply image effects to personalize your visualization completely. --- Your Vision, Your Visualization --- Vythm provides you with numerous options to realize your creative vision: - Over 100 carefully selected backgrounds. - MIDI input for precise visual control. - NDI streaming support for sharing your creations. - Real-time image effects like color correction, bloom, chromatic aberration, and more. - Size, rotation, and orientation adjustments. And much more! The Equalizer, Rhythm, and Peer modes are available for free, while other modes can be unlocked through a subscription. --- Input Formats --- Select your music from a variety of sources: - Import any mp3 or m4a files. - Access your iTunes library (Please note that Apple Music is not currently supported). - Utilize your device's microphone, with sensitivity adjustments for various use cases. - Enjoy three preselected songs for quick inspiration. --- Record Your Masterpiece --- Vythm offers a recording feature that enables you to share or save your creations. Revisit your immersive visual world at your convenience or dazzle your audience with your artistic masterpiece. --- Share Your Thoughts --- Our top priority is to provide you with the best possible experience. If you encounter issues or have ideas for new features, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@mkgames.org. If you enjoy the app, we would greatly appreciate your feedback and a review! Thank you for choosing Vythm! Download and experience Vythm (Music Visualization 2024 / Audio Visualizer) today! Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
